item.title: Change Theme Dynamically with Circular Reveal Animation on Android
item.description: Introduction Dark theme on Android is on a hype at the moment. More and more apps add support for Dark theme over time allowing users to customize their phones, save battery and provide better accessibility. Though another trend which grows today is animated theme changes. First app I saw support of this was Telegram: Source After that in different modifications such feature started to appear in other apps, for example VK.
